extendedInfo.description: â Featured in What's Hot â "Love the fact that itâs such an easy app to use and to learn. Itâs a simple click process; select the frame, add the photos and then choose a border, how much easier can it be? ...I am addicted to this app." - MonsterFreeApps.com Picture Frames Free lets you get photographically creative. Combine multiple photos into beautiful frames then share with others. This app is really easy to use and doesnât cost you a thing. You have those wonderful wedding and honeymoon pictures. There are so many great ones! Youâve been planning to send them to all your friends and relatives one at a time. Yawn. Boring! Why not arrange those special snapshots into attractive groups that everyone will cherish? Maybe put the happy bride and groom at the top, a photo of that beautiful resort where you spent your first night as man and wife beneath it, with a shot of the two of you on the beach beside that. Itâs really easy, go ahead and try it. Okay, that looks nice but letâs jazz it up some more. Select a frame in the color you want, maybe one of your wedding party colors. How does that look? Mmm, not quite there, thicken the border a little. Yes, thatâs perfect! If you want, you can zoom in a bit to make sure people can see those newlywed smiles. Now, that is a great presentation of an important event in your life and it took hardly any time at all. Picture Frames Free makes it super easy to combine multiple photos into frames to share your story with friends and family. There are tons of adjustable frames and a color palette to choose from, so thereâs something for everybody and every occasion. Simply take photos or select existing ones from your camera roll. Arrange them the way you like, zoom, pan, make any adjustments then add any frame in your favorite color. Like we said, there is lots of variety, so get creative and put your personal touches to your photo groups. Make your borders thin, thick or in between, whatever spices up your pictures and makes them pop. Your Picture Frames Free does all the work in a lower resolution, so youâll have faster processing and online uploading. When you print the finished images out though, you get high resolution for crisp clear memories. When youâve finished creating your framed pictures, show them off to others. The application lets you quickly and easily share them on Facebook, Twitter or our public user gallery. The whole world can admire your handiwork and if you want to, you can simply email your photos, like youâd planned to in the first place. However, now they will be extra special mementos of your big day. Check out some of the features you get in Picture Frames Free: * Beautiful, intuitive interface * Very easy to use * Works with existing saved photos or new ones * Offers tons of adjustable frames * Varied color palette for your frame colors * Adjustable border thickness * Zoom, pan, and adjust your images * High resolution for printouts! * Lower resolution for faster processing and online uploading * Share on Facebook, Twitter, or our public user gallery * See what others are creating on the user gallery * Email your creations to friends and family * App supports both the iPhone and iPad Now is the time to let your muse out to play. Download Picture Frames Free, have fun and share your original photo arrangements. Free the Apps! brings you the quality of paid apps for free. We have registered over 37 million total downloads. Your continued support allows us to bring you more updates and apps for free. If you haven't gotten a chance to try out our other top free apps, check them out and spread the word! Thanks! :D freetheapps.com facebook.com/freetheapps twitter.com/freetheapps

reviews.title: Useless app and awful service Beware! Uninstalling
reviews.comment: App looked good and might be if it actually worked! Every time I try to add a photo to a frame app force closes. I\'ve reported it at least 5 times but no response from app owners and no improvement so I\'m now uninstalling. Save yourself time and storage space, don\'t bother with this app.
reviews.author: Linda Burton

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: This app wasn\'t that great from the beginning. I like to give things a chance and time and unfortunately it still remains a poor app. For starters it freezes as soon as I select a frame and the few times I get to choose the frame I like for whatever reason the app tends to rotate my images to landscape even though they were taken and in my photo album as a portrait. It is impossible to get your photos the size you want within the frames. I would skip over this app.
reviews.author: Stefan Jatcko

reviews.title: Hrmm...
reviews.comment: I was enjoying this app, but the last few times I\'ve tried to use it, it\'s force closed on the \'choose a frame\' screen. Have contacted the dev, we\'ll see what happens.
reviews.author: Dannielle Kelley

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app but it just needs to get rid of the forclosures when trying to choose a frame and all the other game signs. Please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Should have read the reviews. Force closes at picture choice. Should be either sorted or taken off play store.
reviews.author: mark harrison

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: This app sucks, wont let me downlaod my photos to the frame, then closes up,&  leaves me waiting ._.
reviews.author: Cassandra Hildebrandt

reviews.title: Where has this app gone???
reviews.comment: Was using this app fine until last week, now it just shuts itself off. ...      .
reviews.author: Donna Worster

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Rubbish. App kept rotating my images so I needed to re-rotate them to view. Very annoying - not simple or fun. Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Wanda Graham

reviews.title: Dreadfull app
reviews.comment: Ppl who see dis dont even bother downloading this because it so bad! It alaways forces close
reviews.author: martha opara

reviews.title: Okay I guess
reviews.comment: Some how it works on my phone while failing to do so from others... All of the frames work besides the one which I would use the most!!!!!!!!! (the first frame)... Other than that the rest of it is pretty good... I recommend it to anyone.... That is if it would even work on your phone! Fix and I would gladly give it 5 stars*
reviews.author: Jarred Govender

reviews.title: Forces close
reviews.comment: Can\'t use the application at all. I pick the frame, forces close, restart, get asked to download a free game, pick frame, forces close & repeat all of these steps multiple times. HTC One X Plus using Android 4.1
reviews.author: Amy Keen

reviews.title: When Does It Ever Work?
reviews.comment: Have never been able to choose a picture. I can change the borders though....:(
reviews.author: Zaadia W

reviews.title: Need to fix problem
reviews.comment: The app force close every time I want to upload a picture.
reviews.author: Danny Santiago

reviews.title: Picture Frames Free
reviews.comment: A scam to sell games and other junk.  DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: When I click on the frame it force closes. Oh and there\'s only 2 pages of free frames, the rest you have to unlock by buying the app. No thanks! Deleting! !
reviews.author: Erin Dargert

reviews.title: Force closes
reviews.comment: Waste of time to download can\'t even use it forces closes everytime I pick a picture
reviews.author: Dangela Alexander

reviews.title: Try again.
reviews.comment: I\'ve already downloaded it before, i\' ve deleted it. I hope it is comportable using now.
reviews.author: Rico Binalla

reviews.title: Waste of time! !!
reviews.comment: Crashed many times before i could load one photo dont bother!!!!!
reviews.author: Adam Smith

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: The app crashes the first time I used it. Even had the gall to ask me if I wanted to install a free game.
reviews.author: Mikey Velasco

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love it
